email_body: you're done To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: does this mean that you are a seller at 70% of the number you put in your retail column?? If so.... i will take PJ Fluer Dom La Grande Dame the cristal looks a little pricey @ 200, but @ 140 i'll take that too. John Arnold 01/22/2001 09:37 PM To: Greg Whalley/HOU/ECT@ECT, Peter F Keavey/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Gentlemen: The following champagne is available at 70% of approximate retail price. Also have interest in trading for red wine. Retail prices derived from Spec's website or Winesearcer.com. Wine has been stored at temperature controlled private wine storage facility. Quan Vintage Wine Retail 3 1990 Perrier Jouet Brut Fleur de Champagne 110 1 1988 Piper Heidsek Reserve 65 2 1990 Dom Perignon 125 1 1990 Veuve Cliquot Ponsardin La Grande Dame 100 1 1988 Taittenger Millesine Brut 85 1 1992 Jacquart Millesine 29 3 1990 Roederer Cristal 200 Any interest??
